original_text:
Many shepherds will ruin my vineyard
    and trample down my field;
they will turn my pleasant field
    into a desolate wasteland.
korean_text: 많은 목자가 내 포도원을 헐며 내 몫을 짓밟아서 내가 기뻐하는 땅을 황무지로 만들었도다

sentences.original_text: Many shepherds will ruin my vineyard
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 목자들이 나의 포도원을 망칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will turn my pleasant field
